question: Question_A_01
statement:
For questions A1-A3 below, $\mathbf{x}$ and $\mathbf{y}$ are the given
vectors below.

\begin{align*}\mathbf{x} = [1,-1,-1], \quad \mathbf{y} = [1,1,2],\end{align*}

A1: Compute $\Vert \mathbf{x} \Vert$.
hints:
Recall that $\Vert \mathbf{x} \Vert$ means the length of vector
\textbf{x}.
